00019 #ifndef _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_TASK_H
00020 #define _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_TASK_H
00021 
00022 #include <sys/types.h>
00023 #include <stdint.h>
00024 #include <xeno_config.h>
00025 #include <copperplate/list.h>
00026 #include <copperplate/threadobj.h>
00027 #include <alchemy/timer.h>
00028 
00029 #define T_LOPRIO  0
00030 #define T_HIPRIO  99
00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Task mode bits.
00034  */
00035 #define T_LOCK          __THREAD_M_LOCK
00036 /* Cobalt only, nop over Mercury. */
00037 #define T_WARNSW        __THREAD_M_WARNSW
00038 #define T_CONFORMING    __THREAD_M_CONFORMING
00039 /* Deprecated, compat only. */
00040 #define T_FPU           0x0
00041 /* CPU mask, up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00042 #define T_CPU(cpu)      (1 << (__THREAD_M_SPARESTART + (cpu & 7)))
00043 #define T_CPUMASK       ((-1 >> (32 - __THREAD_M_SPARESTART - 8)) & \
00044                          ~(__THREAD_M_SPARESTART ? (-1 >> (32 - __THREAD_M_SPARESTART)) : 0))
00045 struct RT_TASK {
00046         uintptr_t handle;
00047 };
00048 
00049 typedef struct RT_TASK RT_TASK;
00050 
00051 struct RT_TASK_MCB {
00052         int flowid;
00053         int opcode;
00054         void *data;
00055         ssize_t size;
00056 };
00057 
00058 typedef struct RT_TASK_MCB RT_TASK_MCB;
00059 
00060 struct RT_TASK_INFO {
00061         int prio;
00062         char name[32];
00063         struct threadobj_stat stat;
00064 };
00065 
00066 typedef struct RT_TASK_INFO RT_TASK_INFO;
00067 
00068 static const RT_TASK no_alchemy_task = { .handle = 0 };

00127 ssize_t rt_task_send_timed(RT_TASK *task,
00128                            RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_s, RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_r,
00129                            const struct timespec *abs_timeout);
00130 
00131 static inline
00132 ssize_t rt_task_send_until(RT_TASK *task,
00133                            RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_s, RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_r,
00134                            RTIME timeout)
00135 {
00136         struct timespec ts;
00137         return rt_task_send_timed(task, mcb_s, mcb_r,
00138                                   alchemy_abs_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00139 }
00140 
00141 static inline
00142 ssize_t rt_task_send(RT_TASK *task,
00143                      RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_s, RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_r,
00144                      RTIME timeout)
00145 {
00146         struct timespec ts;
00147         return rt_task_send_timed(task, mcb_s, mcb_r,
00148                                   alchemy_rel_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00149 }
00150 
00151 int rt_task_receive_timed(RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_r,
00152                           const struct timespec *abs_timeout);
00153 
00154 static inline
00155 int rt_task_receive_until(RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_r, RTIME timeout)
00156 {
00157         struct timespec ts;
00158         return rt_task_receive_timed(mcb_r,
00159                                      alchemy_abs_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00160 }
00161 
00162 static inline
00163 int rt_task_receive(RT_TASK_MCB *mcb_r, RTIME timeout)
00164 {
00165         struct timespec ts;
00166         return rt_task_receive_timed(mcb_r,
00167                                      alchemy_rel_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00168 }
